column1: After the trial, the learned High Court Judge convicted the accused-appellant and he imposed

offence punishable under section 364 (2): 1.  A sentence of 12 years of rigorous imprisonment was imposed.
2.  A fine of Rs. 20,000/= was imposed.

4.  A  sum  of  Rs.  500,000/=  must  be  paid  to the  victim  girl  Madiththa  Kumbure
